auto_qa_result.category: Didn't set the right expectations

category_score_evaluation.legend:
Evaluate the agent's communication regarding next steps, timelines, and known processes. Did the agent clearly outline the upcoming steps? 

If the case depends on a third party (internal/external), was it communicated to the user that no exact time-frames can be given, but that we will do our best to reach out as soon as possible? Did the agent follow through on all set expectations? Check for common process education misses (e.g., 7-day damage investigation limit, parcel return timelines, Free user limitations). If a backlog warning was necessary, was it included, and did it offer alternative channels for urgent matters?

We will NOT deduct agents, for not giving an exact time-frame for a reply back. 
We WILL deduct, if the agent gives an exact time-frame, but then does not keep up their word.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent informed the customer that the package is expected to arrive tomorrow, but did not outline any further actions or follow-ups. There was no mention of what to do if the package does not arrive as expected. The agent only provided the expected arrival time without setting expectations for further communication.

category_score_evaluation.legend: If the last message available was sent by the agent, and it was a question that needs to be answered by the carrier, we consider the next update on the case must come from the customer side and the agent will not be deducted for not setting further expectations.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Not Applicable

category_score_evaluation.legend:
Double-Docking Rule

The fundamental principle is to penalize an agent (or model response) only once per distinct failed action. If a specific piece of evidence (a single utterance, action, or failure) is used to justify a deduction in one scoring category, do not use that exact same evidence to justify a deduction in another category.
This prevents 'double-docking' and ensures the agent is penalized only once for a single mistake.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent's failure to set clear expectations regarding future communications does not repeat evidence from other categories, making this evaluation valid.

auto_qa_result.category: Didn't acknowledge available information

category_score_evaluation.legend: Determine if the agent acknowledged all information provided by the customer (e.g., tracking numbers, error details) before initiating troubleshooting. Furthermore, did the agent demonstrate the use of available internal resources (e.g., Tracking page, Cloudy, Admin) to gather or verify information? For Finance cases, check if the agent acknowledged and used information from the Finance Report Macro.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent acknowledged the customer's order ID and used it to check the tracking system, indicating he accessed internal resources to verify information. He stated, 'I’ve checked the tracking system — your package is currently at the regional hub and is expected to arrive tomorrow.'

category_score_evaluation.legend:
Double-Docking Rule

The fundamental principle is to penalize an agent (or model response) only once per distinct failed action. If a specific piece of evidence (a single utterance, action, or failure) is used to justify a deduction in one scoring category, do not use that exact same evidence to justify a deduction in another category.
This prevents 'double-docking' and ensures the agent is penalized only once for a single mistake.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Each aspect of the agent's conversation has been evaluated separately, with no overlapping deductions applied for the same responses or actions.

auto_qa_result.category: Inaccurate/Ineffective troubleshooting execution

category_score_evaluation.legend:
Assess the efficiency and accuracy of the troubleshooting process. Did the agent provide incorrect or unreliable information? Did the agent proceed ineffectively by skipping essential steps or by failing to ask appropriate probing questions to identify the root cause, leading to unnecessary extra replies? Was the most direct path to resolution taken, or was the approach reactive/passive?
This will NOT be deducted in cases where the agents did not have the opportunity to continue the conversation because the user stopped replying.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent accurately checked the tracking information and provided the customer with an expected delivery date, indicating an effective troubleshooting process. The agent's response, 'your package is currently at the regional hub and is expected to arrive tomorrow,' demonstrates accuracy and efficiency.

category_score_evaluation.legend:
Double-Docking Rule

The fundamental principle is to penalize an agent (or model response) only once per distinct failed action. If a specific piece of evidence (a single utterance, action, or failure) is used to justify a deduction in one scoring category, do not use that exact same evidence to justify a deduction in another category.
This prevents 'double-docking' and ensures the agent is penalized only once for a single mistake.

Troubleshooting and Resolution Scoring Logic

The scoring system strictly enforces the Double-Docking Rule, penalizing a failed action only once, with the exception of the Troubleshooting (T) and Resolution (R) categories. If the agent's failure involves ignoring a clear input or missing probing questions, this is scored as a Fail on T and results in a Troubleshooting issue only deduction. Similarly, if the failure is an incomplete, unclear, or missing solution, this is scored as a Fail on R and results in a Resolution issue only deduction. The single exception to the double-docking rule occurs when a Failed Troubleshooting directly causes a Failed Resolution; in this specific case, both T and R are scored as Fail, and the agent receives a deduction for both. Finally, if the agent tried to solve, but the customer left or ended the conversation prematurely, the R score is marked as N/A (Not Applicable), and T is scored based on the effort and quality demonstrated before the conversation ended.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Since the agent effectively resolved the customer’s issue without any redundant errors, the Double-Docking Rule does not apply in this case as there were no distinct failed actions that would warrant a penalty.

category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent clearly communicated the status of the package and handled the customer's concern regarding the rude previous agent effectively. For example, the agent stated, 'Thank you. I’ve checked the tracking system — your package is currently at the regional hub and is expected to arrive tomorrow.' pickups You can schedule an incidental pickup with DHL Express directly from your Sendcloud panel. Free of charge Recurring pickups Important : A minimum of 10 parcels per pickup is required. Recurring pickups are only available for Lite, Growth and Premium users. Collections will only take place Monday through Friday. Pickups can take place in the morning (9:00-12:00) or in the afternoon

Pickups can take place in the morning (9:00-12:00) or in the afternoon (14:00-17:00). This is subject to the availability of the carrier and depends on the local depot. This ensures that the insurance amount covers the value of the goods for each individual label, not the total value of the order. Is the insurance automatically transferred over when duplicating a label? Any duplicate is considered a new shipment, which means that the duplicated shipment will not have insurance enabled automatically. To add insurance to your duplicate shipment, enable it (again) before creating the

but not received by the customer must be reported within 10 days from the date and time shown by the carrier as delivered. Claims where the status is “not delivered” must be reported no later than 30 days (60 days for international shipments) after the label was created. Claims for damaged shipments should be reported no later than 14 days after delivery. Any labels that have not been shipped, are older than 30 days and have insurance can't be canceled. The biggest cause of claim delays is incorrect or

in the label cost. Press Save when you are done editing the order. Add insurance through default shipping settings You can choose to automatically insure all of your packages by default. To enable this, simply go to Shipping > Shipment Protection in your Sendcloud panel. For more information on setting up default shipping options, go to How to set up your default shipping settings. Add insurance through shipping rules You can use shipping rules to insure your shipments for a certain percentage or amount.

policies. when filing the claim, and if the shipping costs were included in the coverage amount (the insurance that was added when creating the label). auto_qa_result.category: Acknowledged available info

category_score_evaluation.legend: Agents must carefully review and acknowledge all customer-provided data (messages, attachments, screenshots, IDs) and combine it with internal resources (Scout, Helpcenter, Confluence, Tracking, Slack, carrier sites) for troubleshooting. Customers should not repeat already-shared details; clarifying questions are acceptable if they add value.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent addressed the customer's concern regarding the settings affecting print quality and provided assistance. However, the agent could have acknowledged the customer's previous descriptions of the issues more thoroughly, particularly the one about the label printing fine when downloaded. This was not explicitly acknowledged in the agent's response. The agent did mention checking settings but did not express an understanding of the customer's detailed explanation about their print scenario.

auto_qa_result.category: Effective troubleshooting steps followed

category_score_evaluation.legend: Agents must demonstrate a clear and logical approach to diagnosing and resolving the customer’s issue. This includes correctly identifying (or working toward identifying) the root cause, gathering necessary information, and testing possible solutions before escalating.Probing questions are required only when the issue is not clearly defined or when additional details are needed to confirm the root cause.If the issue is already clearly stated by the customer and the agent can proceed directly to resolution, probing questions are not required.Compliance examples include:Asking relevant clarifying questions when information is missing or ambiguous.Systematically testing possible solutions before escalating.Taking steps that logically lead to identifying or resolving the issue.Proceeding directly to resolution when the problem is already clear.Non-compliance includes:Failing to gather necessary information when the issue is unclear.Taking random or incomplete troubleshooting steps
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Throughout the case, the agents collected information about the customer's set-up (e.g. printer type, operating system, and print client usage at 2025-08-12 14:43:27: 'could you please provide us with the following details? Are you using a Mac or Windows system?... agent (2025-07-22 08:12:23): Goedemorgen, Bedankt voor het telefoongesprek van zojuist. DPD Nederland heeft ons laten weten dat een groeiend aantal pakketten niet gescand kan worden vanwege problemen met de etikettering. Deze pakketten moeten handmatig opnieuw gelabeld worden, wat vertragingen veroorzaakt en in sommige gevallen zelfs bijdraagt aan verloren zendingen. Om deze problemen te helpen voorkomen en ervoor te zorgen dat je pakketten soepel worden verwerkt, vragen we je te controleren of je de volgende richtlijnen voor labels volgt: Vereisten voor etikettering Controleer de printerkwaliteit: Als je labels vaag of vlekkerig zijn, heeft je printer mogelijk onderhoud nodig. Plaats labels correct: Zorg ervoor dat de barcode op een plat, zichtbaar oppervlak wordt geplaatst en niet op de zijkant of hoek. Voorkom dat de barcode wordt bedekt: Het inpakken van pakketten in krimpfolie of tape over het label kan scannen onmogelijk maken. Bevestig slechts één label per pakket: Meerdere labels kunnen verwarring en verkeerde routering veroorzaken. Door deze stappen te nemen, help je DPD je pakketten zonder vertraging te scannen en te verzenden, wat leidt tot snellere leveringen en minder problemen voor je klanten. Ik hoop dat ik je hiermee genoeg heb geïnformeerd en zal bij deze dit ticket sluiten. Mocht je nog vragen hebben, ben je uiteraard welkom om te reageren, hierbij zal je de case heropenen. Fijne (werk)dag! 🌻️ Met vriendelijke groet / Kind regards, Celine | Customer Support Consultant Bekijk ook het Sendcloud Help Center voor meer hulp! conversation_content.text_content: Ik heb hulp nodig met een probleem met mijn zending.
Kunt u alstublieft de track en trace-code van uw pakket invoeren? Deze code is altijd langer dan 7 tekens.
Een momentje, ik controleer even de status van uw pakket!
Bedankt voor het wachten! Uw pakket wordt verzonden door DPD en de laatste bijgewerkte status is In sorteercentrum.
Klik op de link om de laatste trackingupdates te bekijken 👇
Ondervindt u problemen met dit pakket?
Ja
Zeker, kunt u het onderwerp voor het aanmaken van het ticket kiezen?
Problemen met de verzending
Selecteer hieronder het onderwerp
Andere vragen
Bedankt dat je dat hebt uitgekozen! 😊 Mijn geweldige mensenvriend gaat je helpen! 🙌

Ik ga je nu verbinden met een van mijn geweldige menselijke maatjes! Ze reageren meestal binnen een paar minuten. 

Bedankt voor het geduld! 😊
Handing over to an agent
Conversation with Nander Knobben

Goedemorgen, bedankt dat je contact met ons hebt opgenomen! 😄️

Ik begrijp dat er iets mis is met dit pakket 05222387226064, sorry daarvoor! 😕️ Laat me even voor je kijken 🏃️ (vertaald)

Ik begrijp wat je bedoelt, dit pakket is 3 dagen geleden gescand in het bezorgcentrum en sindsdien zijn er geen updates meer.

Het is duidelijk dat de bezorging vertraagd is, ik begrijp dat dit vervelend is en bied de vervoerder mijn excuses aan! 😕️

De beste manier om erachter te komen wat er met dit pakket aan de hand is, is door een ticket te openen via de ondersteuningssectie van ons panel. Ben je er op de een of andere manier al mee bekend? Zo niet, dan kun je op deze link klikken: https://app.sendcloud.com/v2/support/new-ticket om een nieuw ticket te openen. Ik raad aan om in dit geval de categorie voor een vertraagd pakket te selecteren.

Als dit gebeurt, wordt de vervoerder onmiddellijk op de hoogte gebracht en wordt er een onderzoek gestart aan de kant van de vervoerder. Alle informatie/vereiste documentatie wordt op dezelfde plaats opgeslagen en is beschikbaar voor zowel ons als de vervoerder. 
Na deze stap nemen wij de communicatie met de vervoerder namens jou af! 🙇️

Helaas zijn we voor verzendproblemen nog steeds erg afhankelijk van hen, aangezien we geen vervoerder zijn maar alleen een tussenpersoon en dit is de procedure die we hebben ingesteld als er een probleem is met de levering 🤕️

Als je meer uitleg of hulp nodig hebt bij het aanmaken van het ticket, laat het me dan gerust weten, ik help je graag verder! 🙂  (vertaald)

Goedemorgen, 

Ik heb een week geleden een waterfilter besteld, maar deze is nog niet geleverd. Hij zou bezorgd worden met DPD bij een pakketpunt dat ik bij verzending kon selecteren. Nu blijkt dat pakketpunt niet te bestaan. Ik zou graag het verzendadres wijzigen naar mijn thuisadres, anders gaat hij nooit aankomen. 
Tracking nr.: 05222387226064
het probleem is echter dat het afleveradres aangepast zou moeten worden
waar kan ik dit doen? / kan ik dit nog doen?

Oh, ik snap het! Dit is echt jammer moet ik zeggen 😥️

Ik kijk even voor je of een wijziging mogelijk is 🙏️ (vertaald)

Het lijkt erop dat DPD zelf niet de mogelijkheid biedt om de bezorging van dit pakket te wijzigen: meestal is dit mogelijk op de trackingpagina van DPD, ze bieden je de mogelijkheid om het adres of de bezorgmethode te wijzigen, maar ik zie niet dat dit in dit geval een mogelijkheid is 😥️

Aangezien het pakket echter nog steeds is gemarkeerd als zijnde in het bezorgcentrum, kan het misschien werken om een ticket te openen voor een adreswijzigingsverzoek! Via dezelfde link die ik je in mijn vorige bericht heb gestuurd, kun je een verzoek doorsturen om het adres van de bezorging te wijzigen 🙂 

Helaas kan ik niet garanderen dat dit werkt, het hangt ervan af hoe snel de vervoerder de aanvraag zal ophalen, maar het is een poging die we kunnen doen!  (vertaald)
Bedankt!

Natuurlijk, het is me een genoegen om zoveel mogelijk te helpen!
Ik duimen voor dit pakket 🤞️

Voordat ik je verlaat, zou je dit berichtengesprek willen beoordelen en een reactie willen achterlaten? Op deze manier kunnen we onze service blijven verbeteren. Dit kan gedaan worden zodra onze chat is afgelopen! Bij voorbaat bedankt! 🙏️


Bedankt dat je met ons wilde praten! Als je nog vragen hebt, kun je dit gesprek opnieuw openen. Ik wens je een geweldige dag! 🌷️
 (vertaald)
Please rate our support

auto_qa_result.category: Didn't set the right expectations

category_score_evaluation.legend:
Evaluate the agent's communication regarding next steps, timelines, and known processes. Did the agent clearly outline the upcoming steps? 

If the case depends on a third party (internal/external), was it communicated to the user that no exact time-frames can be given, but that we will do our best to reach out as soon as possible? Did the agent follow through on all set expectations? Check for common process education misses (e.g., 7-day damage investigation limit, parcel return timelines, Free user limitations). If a backlog warning was necessary, was it included, and did it offer alternative channels for urgent matters?

We will NOT deduct agents, for not giving an exact time-frame for a reply back. 
We WILL deduct, if the agent gives an exact time-frame, but then does not keep up their word.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent informed the customer about the possibility of opening a ticket for an address change request but did not clarify that it may not be successful nor set a clear expectation that this was not guaranteed. Saying 'I cannot guarantee that this works' lacks a clear next step and expectation for the customer.

category_score_evaluation.legend: If the last message available was sent by the agent, and it was a question that needs to be answered by the carrier, we consider the next update on the case must come from the customer side and the agent will not be deducted for not setting further expectations.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Not Applicable

category_score_evaluation.legend:
Double-Docking Rule

The fundamental principle is to penalize an agent (or model response) only once per distinct failed action. If a specific piece of evidence (a single utterance, action, or failure) is used to justify a deduction in one scoring category, do not use that exact same evidence to justify a deduction in another category.
This prevents 'double-docking' and ensures the agent is penalized only once for a single mistake.

category_score_evaluation.legend:
Double-Docking Rule

The fundamental principle is to penalize an agent (or model response) only once per distinct failed action. If a specific piece of evidence (a single utterance, action, or failure) is used to justify a deduction in one scoring category, do not use that exact same evidence to justify a deduction in another category.
This prevents 'double-docking' and ensures the agent is penalized only once for a single mistake.

auto_qa_result.category: Inaccurate/Ineffective troubleshooting execution

category_score_evaluation.legend:
Assess the efficiency and accuracy of the troubleshooting process. Did the agent provide incorrect or unreliable information? Did the agent proceed ineffectively by skipping essential steps or by failing to ask appropriate probing questions to identify the root cause, leading to unnecessary extra replies? Was the most direct path to resolution taken, or was the approach reactive/passive?
This will NOT be deducted in cases where the agents did not have the opportunity to continue the conversation because the user stopped replying.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent provided information about the tracking status and the process for opening a ticket for a delayed package. However, the agent ultimately conveyed that DPD does not allow changes to the delivery, which could have been resolved more efficiently by confirming the process beforehand and suggesting immediate action on the ticket opening. For example, the agent mentions, 'Het lijkt erop dat DPD zelf niet de mogelijkheid biedt om de bezorging van dit pakket te wijzigen... maar ik zie niet dat dit in dit geval een mogelijkheid is.'

category_score_evaluation.legend:
Double-Docking Rule

The fundamental principle is to penalize an agent (or model response) only once per distinct failed action. If a specific piece of evidence (a single utterance, action, or failure) is used to justify a deduction in one scoring category, do not use that exact same evidence to justify a deduction in another category.
This prevents 'double-docking' and ensures the agent is penalized only once for a single mistake.

Troubleshooting and Resolution Scoring Logic

The scoring system strictly enforces the Double-Docking Rule, penalizing a failed action only once, with the exception of the Troubleshooting (T) and Resolution (R) categories. If the agent's failure involves ignoring a clear input or missing probing questions, this is scored as a Fail on T and results in a Troubleshooting issue only deduction. Similarly, if the failure is an incomplete, unclear, or missing solution, this is scored as a Fail on R and results in a Resolution issue only deduction. The single exception to the double-docking rule occurs when a Failed Troubleshooting directly causes a Failed Resolution; in this specific case, both T and R are scored as Fail, and the agent receives a deduction for both. Finally, if the agent tried to solve, but the customer left or ended the conversation prematurely, the R score is marked as N/A (Not Applicable), and T is scored based on the effort and quality demonstrated before the conversation ended.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent did not adhere strictly to the need for a clear resolution direction. Although the agent offered an alternative solution by suggesting a ticket for the address change, the initial steps taken could have been more proactive and insightful regarding DPD's options. However, as the agent provided enough information on next steps, both T and R are sufficiently addressed in this specific instance.

auto_qa_result.category: Fast

category_score_evaluation.legend: The FAST score measures an agent's (model's) efficiency and structural approach in meeting customer needs swiftly. It focuses on the ability to deliver prompt solutions by expertly using structured resources, articles, and available tools.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent displayed efficiency by quickly checking the status of the package and providing relevant information about the next steps. For example, at 'Ik kijk even voor je of een wijziging mogelijk is', the agent acknowledges the customer's request and moves towards solutioning.

category_score_evaluation.legend:
NOT MET (will result in deduction): The model fails to provide timely responses or solutions. The conversation flow shows a lack of structure in resource retrieval or tool usage, resulting in significant delays in issue resolution. This includes struggling to manage the concurrent handling of different information needs (simulated 'multiple chats'), leading to an excessively high Time To Solve (TTS) even for straightforward issues (e.g., simple error announcement resolution).


NOT APPLICABLE (will be marked N/A and will NOT result in deduction): The model delivers solutions within a generally acceptable timeframe but misses clear opportunities for efficiency optimization. Key resources or tools are utilized, but there are occasional, non-critical delays or evident room for improvement in speed or structural use of information. This also applies when the model needs to internally escalate to a knowledge base expert (e.g., 'Guru / own team') to confirm a procedural step before proceeding.

MET: The model consistently delivers fast, efficient service with a high degree of structure. It demonstrates expert leverage of all available resources, articles, and tools, providing timely, well-organized, and accurate solutions that meet or exceed the expected speed benchmark. This includes the ability to resolve complex issues without needing to escalate internally for procedural confirmation.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Not Applicable

auto_qa_result.category: Didn't introduce themselves properly/wasn't welcoming

category_score_evaluation.legend:
A complete introduction includes a friendly greeting, addressing the customer by name if available in the signature, and acknowledging their question/issue. We will deduct if we consider that the agent didn’t establish a proper initial connection with the customer.

Messaging: We avoid generic openings like 'Hello' or 'Hi' and thank the user for reaching out to us. Emojis can be used for a personal touch, but the key is to create a warm and welcoming tone from the start. The introduction should be in one message, all acknowledged information should be mentioned. Please note that it is not mandatory to introduce yourself as your name is also visible. However, it looks more personal if we introduce ourselves.

Email: We will only address the user by name if the name is visible on their signature. The reason behind this is that even if we see a name on the right side of the ZD panel, we don’t know for sure if we are talking to this specific person since multiple people tend to use the same account when reaching us.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent responded with a friendly 'Goedemorgen, bedankt dat je contact met ons hebt opgenomen! 😄️' which establishes a welcoming atmosphere. However, there was no personal touch as they did not address the customer by name, which could improve the connection.

auto_qa_result.category: Agent Call Disconnection

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must confirm the conversation is complete before disconnecting by: (1) explicitly asking if the customer has any other questions or concerns (e.g., 'Is there anything else I can help you with today?'), (2) waiting for customer confirmation that their issue is resolved or they have no further queries, and (3) providing a professional closing statement before disconnecting. Exception: The agent may disconnect immediately without these steps if the customer uses abusive, threatening, or profane language after one warning

category_score_evaluation.legend: When the customer becomes unresponsive or silent during the call, the agent must make three distinct verbal attempts to re-engage before disconnecting. Each attempt must: (1) directly address the customer with 'Hello', 'Sir/Ma'am', or their name, (2) include a verification question like 'Are you still there?' or 'Can you hear me?', and (3) be spaced 10-15 seconds apart to allow adequate response time. If the customer responds at any point, the agent must resume normal conversation. After the third unanswered attempt, the agent may disconnect with a brief closing statement like 'I'll end the call now. Please call us back when ready.' Exception: The agent may disconnect call if there are clear technical indicators of line disconnection.

category_score_evaluation.legend: When the customer becomes unresponsive or silent during the call, the agent must make three distinct verbal attempts to re-engage before disconnecting. Each attempt must: (1) directly address the customer with 'Hello', 'Sir/Ma'am', or their name, (2) include a verification question like 'Are you still there?' or 'Can you hear me?', and (3) be spaced 10-15 seconds apart to allow adequate response time. If the customer responds at any point, the agent must resume normal conversation. After the third unanswered attempt, the agent may disconnect with a brief closing statement like 'I'll end the call now. Please call us back when ready.' Exception: The agent may disconnect call if there are clear technical indicators of line disconnection.

conversation_content.text_content:
Dear Ilu Design B.V.,
 
We have received your message and are here to help!
You have informed us that your shipment with the tracking number JVGL05942438000549337853 has a wrong receiver address.
 
The correct receiver address as reported by you is:
LuxImprove B.V. T.a.v. Job de Visser Carbonweg 6 4462DX Goes NL
 
We have forwarded your request to the carrier, who will investigate the case immediately.
As soon as we receive an update about your request, we will inform you directly via email.
 
Kind regards,
Customer Support | Sendcloud

Sendcloud Help Center Chamber of Commerce: 66572959 | VAT number: NL856613897B01

Deze claim is geëscaleerd. Een Zendesk klantticket is aangemaakt.

Sendcloud Help Center Chamber of Commerce: 66572959 | VAT number: NL856613897B01

Goedendag,

We willen je graag op de hoogte stellen dat we momenteel Engelse support aanbieden. Dit om ervoor te zorgen dat je zo snel mogelijk wordt voorzien van een oplossing. Indien je wenst geholpen te worden door een Nederlandse collega, dan kun je dit aangeven door op dit bericht te reageren. Houd er rekening mee dat het dan iets langer kan duren dan je gewend bent voordat je een antwoord ontvangt. Bedankt voor het begrip.
 
 
Thank you for initiating this investigation. I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the incorrect return of your package.
 
We have received a response from the carrier. They were unable to make the address change in time and confirmed that the shipment was returned in error. They also expressed their apologies for this mistake. The new return tracking numbers are as follows: JVGL05942438973323819 and JVGL05942438250823821.
 
To compensate for the inconvenience, the carrier will reimburse the shipping costs for these shipments. You will see this reimbursement credited to your Sendcloud invoice within 15 working days, referencing the corresponding tracking numbers.
 
I hope this helps to alleviate the disappointment, and if you have any further questions or need assistance with anything, please do not hesitate to reach out.
 
For now, I wish you a wonderful evening and smooth shipping. ️
 
Kindest regards,

Giselle | Customer Support Consultant

Check out our Help Center to read more about how you can get support from Sendcloud.

Stadhuisplein 10 5611 EM Eindhoven | Chamber of Commerce: 66572959 | VAT number: NL856613897B01

category_score_evaluation.legend: Agents must carefully review and acknowledge all customer-provided data (messages, attachments, screenshots, IDs) and combine it with internal resources (Scout, Helpcenter, Confluence, Tracking, Slack, carrier sites) for troubleshooting. Customers should not repeat already-shared details; clarifying questions are acceptable if they add value.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent correctly acknowledged the customer's claim regarding the incorrect address and provided a follow-up with the new tracking numbers. The agent demonstrated comprehension of the customer's issue, stating, "You have informed us that your shipment with the tracking number JVGL05942438000549337853 has a wrong receiver address."

category_score_evaluation.legend: Agents must demonstrate a clear and logical approach to diagnosing and resolving the customer’s issue. This includes correctly identifying (or working toward identifying) the root cause, gathering necessary information, and testing possible solutions before escalating.Probing questions are required only when the issue is not clearly defined or when additional details are needed to confirm the root cause.If the issue is already clearly stated by the customer and the agent can proceed directly to resolution, probing questions are not required.Compliance examples include:Asking relevant clarifying questions when information is missing or ambiguous.Systematically testing possible solutions before escalating.Taking steps that logically lead to identifying or resolving the issue.Proceeding directly to resolution when the problem is already clear.Non-compliance includes:Failing to gather necessary information when the issue is unclear.Taking random or incomplete troubleshooting steps
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent carefully acknowledged the problem by restating the tracking number and the correct address reported by the customer ('You have informed us that your shipment with the tracking number **JVGL05942438000549337853 has a wrong receiver address**. The correct receiver address as reported by you is: ...'). The agent escalated the case to the carrier ('We have forwarded your request to the carrier, who will investigate the case immediately.') and promised proactive updates. In the final update, the agent reported on the carrier's findings, provided new tracking numbers for returned shipments, apologized for the inconvenience, and explained the forthcoming reimbursement ('They were unable to make the address change in time and confirmed that the shipment was returned in error...the carrier will reimburse the shipping costs...'). The logical steps, timely escalation, and communication align with all compliance requirements in the legend.

category_score_evaluation.legend: Agent need to respect user- query without speaking abusive or bad words towards user
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent communicated respectfully throughout the conversation, using polite language and offering assistance without any abusive or disrespectful remarks. For example, the phrase 'We are here to help!' demonstrates a professional and courteous approach.

manual_qa_result.category: Workaround offered or utilized feature cross/upsell opportunity

category_score_evaluation.legend: Agents should proactively identify opportunities to guide customers toward relevant products, features, or plans that could add value to their experience. Recommendations must be personalized, addressing the customer’s specific needs, goals, or usage patterns. The intent is to enhance satisfaction and trust, not to sell unnecessarily.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Not Applicable

category_score_evaluation.legend: Agents should correctly mention the customer’s name in the greeting only if the customer has explicitly provided their name within the conversation (e.g., in the message body or signature). If the customer has not mentioned or signed their name, using a generic greeting (e.g., “Hi,” or “Hello,”) is acceptable.Agents must use a professional closing, such as “Best regards,” or “Thanks & regards,” followed by their own name.Non-compliance includes:Using the wrong name (e.g., customer signs as “Peter” but the agent says “Hi Lauren”).Using the name inferred from the email address if the customer hasn’t explicitly mentioned or signed it.Using informal or abrupt greetings/closings (e.g., “Hey,” “Hi there,” or “Thanks” without a signature).Do not deduct points if:The customer has not provided a name, and the agent uses a neutral greeting like “Hi,” or “Hello.”Example:Customer signs: “Regards, Peter.”→ Correct: “Hi Peter,”→ Incorrect: “Hi Lauren,” or no name used at all.Customer does not sign or mention their name.→ Correct: “Hi,” or “Hello,” (without assuming a name from the email address).
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent provided a professional closing with their name, saying 'Kindest regards, Giselle | Customer Support Consultant'. However, they did not use the customer's name in the greeting because it was not provided. The greeting 'Dear Ilu Design B.V.' is generic and appropriate.

category_score_evaluation.legend: Agents must maintain proper spacing, capitalization, spelling, and punctuation throughout the email to ensure readability and professionalism. For example: no missing spaces, correct capitalization of sentences and proper nouns, and proper spelling and punctuation throughout. Non-compliance includes having 3 or more mistakes on the following: spelling or grammatical errors, improper capitalization, and missing or extra spaces between words or after punctuation.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent's email includes improper spacing and capitalization, especially in the initial greeting and various sections, which detracts from professionalism. For example, 'Goedendag,      We willen je graag...'.

category_score_evaluation.legend: Agent should close the conversation with the closing statement by thanking the customer and after asking futher-more quries
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent concluded their message with 'For now, I wish you a wonderful evening and smooth shipping,' but did not explicitly thank the customer for reaching out or invite further questions after that.

category_score_evaluation.legend: Agents must communicate respectfully, avoiding offensive, discriminatory, or aggressive language. Emails should not be rude, condescending, or use bold/ALL CAPS to emphasize points. Compliance examples include: “We understand your concern and will assist you promptly,” or “Apologies for the inconvenience caused; we are looking into this.” Non-compliance includes rude remarks, aggressive ALL CAPS, or sarcastic, discriminatory, or condescending language.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent communicated respectfully and professionally, providing detailed information and apologies where necessary, such as, 'I apologize for the inconvenience caused by the incorrect return of your package.'

sop_data: Shipping . Step 1: Fill in customer information Make sure all customer details are correct to prevent delivery issues. Once you select a destination country that requires customs documents, the relevant fields will automatically appear. For customer information, please include the sender’s tax numbers if they are not already specified in the Sender's address. You may also add the tax numbers of the receiver or importer of record to the parcel, although these are optional for international shipments. *

automatically be taken from your Sender address. UKIMS number: For B2B shipment between Great Britain and Northern Ireland, you will need a UK IMS number. You can request this number via the UK government website . This number is not required for B2C shipments. Add at Label details Name and address of recipient: the address of the recipient (receiver) will be taken from the order information. If you create the label manually, you need to add this information yourself, like you would for any other label.

conversation_content.text_content: Ik heb hulp nodig met een probleem met mijn zending.
Kunt u alstublieft de track en trace-code van uw pakket invoeren? Deze code is altijd langer dan 7 tekens.
Een momentje, ik controleer even de status van uw pakket!
Bedankt voor het wachten! Uw pakket wordt verzonden door DPD en de laatste bijgewerkte status is In sorteercentrum.
Klik op de link om de laatste trackingupdates te bekijken 👇
Ondervindt u problemen met dit pakket?
Ja
Zeker, kunt u het onderwerp voor het aanmaken van het ticket kiezen?
Problemen met de verzending
Selecteer hieronder het onderwerp
Andere vragen
Bedankt dat je dat hebt uitgekozen! 😊 Mijn geweldige mensenvriend gaat je helpen! 🙌

Ik ga je nu verbinden met een van mijn geweldige menselijke maatjes! Ze reageren meestal binnen een paar minuten. 

Bedankt voor het geduld! 😊
Handing over to an agent
Conversation with Nander Knobben

Goedemorgen, bedankt dat je contact met ons hebt opgenomen! 😄️

Ik begrijp dat er iets mis is met dit pakket 05222387226064, sorry daarvoor! 😕️ Laat me even voor je kijken 🏃️ (vertaald)

Ik begrijp wat je bedoelt, dit pakket is 3 dagen geleden gescand in het bezorgcentrum en sindsdien zijn er geen updates meer.

Het is duidelijk dat de bezorging vertraagd is, ik begrijp dat dit vervelend is en bied de vervoerder mijn excuses aan! 😕️

De beste manier om erachter te komen wat er met dit pakket aan de hand is, is door een ticket te openen via de ondersteuningssectie van ons panel. Ben je er op de een of andere manier al mee bekend? Zo niet, dan kun je op deze link klikken: https://app.sendcloud.com/v2/support/new-ticket om een nieuw ticket te openen. Ik raad aan om in dit geval de categorie voor een vertraagd pakket te selecteren.

Als dit gebeurt, wordt de vervoerder onmiddellijk op de hoogte gebracht en wordt er een onderzoek gestart aan de kant van de vervoerder. Alle informatie/vereiste documentatie wordt op dezelfde plaats opgeslagen en is beschikbaar voor zowel ons als de vervoerder. 
Na deze stap nemen wij de communicatie met de vervoerder namens jou af! 🙇️

Helaas zijn we voor verzendproblemen nog steeds erg afhankelijk van hen, aangezien we geen vervoerder zijn maar alleen een tussenpersoon en dit is de procedure die we hebben ingesteld als er een probleem is met de levering 🤕️

Als je meer uitleg of hulp nodig hebt bij het aanmaken van het ticket, laat het me dan gerust weten, ik help je graag verder! 🙂  (vertaald)

Goedemorgen, 

Ik heb een week geleden een waterfilter besteld, maar deze is nog niet geleverd. Hij zou bezorgd worden met DPD bij een pakketpunt dat ik bij verzending kon selecteren. Nu blijkt dat pakketpunt niet te bestaan. Ik zou graag het verzendadres wijzigen naar mijn thuisadres, anders gaat hij nooit aankomen. 
Tracking nr.: 05222387226064
het probleem is echter dat het afleveradres aangepast zou moeten worden
waar kan ik dit doen? / kan ik dit nog doen?

Oh, ik snap het! Dit is echt jammer moet ik zeggen 😥️

Ik kijk even voor je of een wijziging mogelijk is 🙏️ (vertaald)

Het lijkt erop dat DPD zelf niet de mogelijkheid biedt om de bezorging van dit pakket te wijzigen: meestal is dit mogelijk op de trackingpagina van DPD, ze bieden je de mogelijkheid om het adres of de bezorgmethode te wijzigen, maar ik zie niet dat dit in dit geval een mogelijkheid is 😥️

Aangezien het pakket echter nog steeds is gemarkeerd als zijnde in het bezorgcentrum, kan het misschien werken om een ticket te openen voor een adreswijzigingsverzoek! Via dezelfde link die ik je in mijn vorige bericht heb gestuurd, kun je een verzoek doorsturen om het adres van de bezorging te wijzigen 🙂 

Helaas kan ik niet garanderen dat dit werkt, het hangt ervan af hoe snel de vervoerder de aanvraag zal ophalen, maar het is een poging die we kunnen doen!  (vertaald)
Bedankt!

Natuurlijk, het is me een genoegen om zoveel mogelijk te helpen!
Ik duimen voor dit pakket 🤞️

Voordat ik je verlaat, zou je dit berichtengesprek willen beoordelen en een reactie willen achterlaten? Op deze manier kunnen we onze service blijven verbeteren. Dit kan gedaan worden zodra onze chat is afgelopen! Bij voorbaat bedankt! 🙏️


Bedankt dat je met ons wilde praten! Als je nog vragen hebt, kun je dit gesprek opnieuw openen. Ik wens je een geweldige dag! 🌷️
 (vertaald)

category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent provided a professional closing statement: 'Thank you sir. Thanks for choosing InCred Finance. Have a nice day.' However, the agent did not explicitly confirm that the customer had no further questions or concerns, nor did the agent wait for such confirmation before disconnecting.

category_score_evaluation.legend: When the customer becomes unresponsive or silent during the call, the agent must make three distinct verbal attempts to re-engage before disconnecting. Each attempt must: (1) directly address the customer with 'Hello', 'Sir/Ma'am', or their name, (2) include a verification question like 'Are you still there?' or 'Can you hear me?', and (3) be spaced 10-15 seconds apart to allow adequate response time. If the customer responds at any point, the agent must resume normal conversation. After the third unanswered attempt, the agent may disconnect with a brief closing statement like 'I'll end the call now. Please call us back when ready.' Exception: The agent may disconnect call if there are clear technical indicators of line disconnection.

Dear Marzio Gagliardi,
 
We have received your message and are here to help!
You have informed us that your shipment with the tracking number 179012829478, and order number 3721, is delayed. We have forwarded your request to the carrier, who will investigate the case immediately.
As soon as we receive an update about your request, we will inform you directly via email.
 
Kind regards,
Customer Support | Sendcloud

Sendcloud Help Center Chamber of Commerce: 66572959 | VAT number: NL856613897B01

Questo reclamo è stato trasferito a un operatore. È stato creato un ticket cliente su Zendesk.

Sendcloud Help Center Chamber of Commerce: 66572959 | VAT number: NL856613897B01

Buon pomeriggio,
 
Sono Giulia del Team Customer Support Sendcloud, grazie per averci scritto!

Mi spiace che la tua spedizione abbia subito un ritardo. Volevamo confermarti che BRT ha in carico il tuo reclamo e che stanno proseguendo con le indagini.

Ti faremo sapere non appena avremo degli aggiornamenti e non esitare a contattarci in caso di ulteriore assistenza.
 
Una buona giornata e buon lavoro.

Cordiali saluti,

Giulia | Customer Support Consultant

Consulta il nostro Help Center per saperne di più su come ricevere assistenza da Sendcloud.

Stadhuisplein 10 5611 EM Eindhoven | Chamber of Commerce: 66572959 | VAT number: NL856613897B01

Ciao,

Da quando hai creato un ticket di supporto per il pacco 179012829478, abbiamo tenuto d’occhio lo stato della spedizione. Abbiamo notato che lo stato di questo pacco ora è ‘’Consegnato’’, da come si vede alla pagina Track & Trace.

Per favore considera che ‘’Consegnato’’ potrebbe significare che il pacco è stato consegnato ad un ufficio postale/ punto di ritiro e non all’indirizzo originario.

Vorremmo chiederti di confermare assieme al tuo cliente se il pacco è stato consegnato. Potresti avvisarci rispondendo a questa email nel caso in cui il pacco non sia stato correttamente ricevuto?

Qualora ti servisse ulteriore assistenza, saremo felici di aiutarti!

Cordiali saluti,

Team Sendcloud
REQUESTER HAS RECEIVED THE SATISMETER C-SAT SURVEY IN Italiano

Escalation Guide ✨
Please make sure to check the following before escalate your ticket:
  • Can you reproduce the issue?
  • Did you check if this is not an expected behavior?
  • Did you check with your  team?
  • Have you checked: Slack/ Help Center/ Jira/ Confluence/ Integration Heaven?
Please note: provide visual proof where possible and also a translation into English of error messages/important information
************************************************************************
User ID:  koen@fashionhub.nl​  - 77367​ 
Sendcloud subscription plan: Premium
Parcel ID and/or Order no.:
Integration ID: 326871, 326873 & 438346
Shop version: 
Plugin version (if applicable):
Date Occurred: 15 july
—
Description (please include expected behavior here): 
Fashionhub, is experiencing a recurring issue where service points are not being displayed correctly in their Lightspeed checkout, despite all required configurations seemingly being in place.



What is the desired outcome?
Customers should be able to select their preferred service point directly during checkout.

The user is willing to create an account for us, but would first like to know which permissions we need. Could you please share this information with me so we can investigate the issue further?
—
Steps to reproduce: (if not reproducible, pls add the user steps here)
  1. Go to one of the customer's websites, for example: https://www.shoebidooshoes.com/nl/cart/
  2. Add a product to your shopping cart and proceed to the checkout
  3. Choose a shipping method for which service points should be activated
  4. Notice that the service points are not displayed, despite correct configuration in Lightspeed
  5. (Optional) Open the settings in the Lightspeed backend to confirm that the country settings, shipping method, and Sendcloud plugin are correctly configured.

************************************************************************

Hi Vera, 
 
Thank you for the information in your report.
 
Do you know if the user is using the legacy checkout or the new checkout? (The legacy version would open a service point map, while the new checkout shows a list of service points) 
 
I found this Jira - https://sendcloud.atlassian.net/browse/SL-3028?search_id=c78e8de8-f171-4388-8614-62bbd767e073 where the issue was solved by deactivating the service points and activating it again. This applied for the new checkout. 
 
Could you please ask the user to enable the hijack so we can test this? If this does not work then I would need access to their backend, but let's try this first. 
 
Thanks! 

Kind regards | Mit freundlichen Grüßen,

Fabian | Technical Support Specialist!

Need more help? Check out the Sendcloud Helpcenter
Sendcloud | Stadhuisplein 10 | 5611 EM Eindhoven | The Netherlands
Chamber of Commerce: 66572959 | VAT number: NL856613897B01

REQUESTER HAS RECEIVED THE FOLLOWING EMAIL NOTIFICATION IN English (UK)

Hello Vera,

We want to help you in resolving this case as soon as possible. In order for us to move forward, we requested some information 5 days ago. Unfortunately, we have not yet received a response.

If you'd like to provide an update or need more time to collect this information, simply reply to this email and let us know. If we don't hear back from you we'll solve this ticket within the next few days.

Thanks in advance!

Best regards,

Team Sendcloud

Good morning Fabian,

According to the customer they are using both the legacy and the new checkout and they disabled the servicepoints and enabled them again. Sadly this did not work for them.

They also enabled Hijack again.

Looking forward to your reply and thanks!

Hi Kai, 
 
Thank you for getting back to me on this. 
 
In this case, we will indeed need access to the user's backend please. 
 
We require permission to access and change their settings, especially the shipping methods and settings. 
 
Please let me know once the user shared the access with us. 
 
Thank you very much! 

Kind regards | Mit freundlichen Grüßen,

Fabian | Technical Support Specialist!

Need more help? Check out the Sendcloud Helpcenter

Waarom Returned to Sender als er bevestigd is dat de adreswijziging in orde was?!?!
Het 2de pakket (waarvoor ook een ticket werd gemaakt) wordt niet gelezen?

Goedenavond,
 
Hartelijk dank voor uw bericht.
 
Het spijt me te horen dat uw zending ten onrechte is geretourneerd, ondanks dat de vervoerder had bevestigd dat het adres succesvol was bijgewerkt. Ik heb dit zojuist intern nagekeken en dit blijkt inderdaad het geval te zijn.
 
Ik heb zojuist contact opgenomen met de vervoerder en gevraagd om ons meer duidelijkheid te geven over de reden van de mislukte afleverpoging en de retourzending. Zodra wij een reactie ontvangen, zal ik u direct informeren.
 
Ik wens u een fijne avond en aarzel niet om contact met ons op te nemen als u in de tussentijd nog vragen heeft.
 
Met vriendelijke groet,

Fabrice | Customer Support Consultant

auto_qa_result.category: Did the agent open the call within the timeline (6 sec), Introduced self and the brand.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should open the call within 6 seconds of the customer's connection, demonstrating promptness and adherence to timelines.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent answered quickly after the customer started the conversation, with no significant delay between the customer finishing and the agent's reply.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must introduce themselves clearly, ensuring the customer is aware of who is handling their query.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent only responded with 'Okay' and did not introduce themselves at any point during the call.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should mention the brand name 'Incred' or 'incredfinance' during the opening, reinforcing the company's identity and professionalism.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent failed to mention the brand name 'Incred' or 'incredfinance' at the start or during any self-introduction.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should greet the customer according to the time of day. For example, Good morning, Good afternoon, Good Evening. This shows the proactiveness of the agents.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The customer greeted with 'Good morning', but the agent did not provide any greeting in response.

auto_qa_result.category: Did the agent do the right party verification?

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should complete the right verification promptly without causing unnecessary delays. At least two of the details must be verified. Example of the details are, registered mobile number, Date of Birth, Address, PAN, EMI Amount and Bank account - both inclusive, registered email address, and EMI Amount and Disbursal Amount - both inclusive.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent asked for both the customer's date of birth and PAN number for verification and acknowledged the completion: 'Thank you for the verification.'

category_score_evaluation.legend: If the verification failed, the agent should not proceed with the request, adhere to security protocols, and advise the customer to complete the verification process.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Not Applicable

auto_qa_result.category: Did the Agent follow Hold Procedure(60Sec)on call? Was there dead air(more than 7 secs) or call on mute for more than 7 secs ?

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should adhere to the communicated hold duration of 60 seconds, ensuring commitment to timelines.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent asked the customer to be online at 03:50, returned at 04:27, and apologized for making him wait, which is slightly over standard hold time but the agent acknowledged the hold.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must avoid prolonged dead air (dead air of not more than 6 seconds) during the interaction, ensuring continuous engagement.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: There was a hold for over 30 seconds with no engagement, but this was communicated, so there was no unacknowledged dead air in the general flow besides the hold.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must give a refresher if the call is on hold for more than 150 seconds.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Not Applicable

auto_qa_result.category: Agent Call Disconnection

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must confirm the conversation is complete before disconnecting by: (1) explicitly asking if the customer has any other questions or concerns (e.g., 'Is there anything else I can help you with today?'), (2) waiting for customer confirmation that their issue is resolved or they have no further queries, and (3) providing a professional closing statement before disconnecting. Exception: The agent may disconnect immediately without these steps if the customer uses abusive, threatening, or profane language after one warning
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent asked if any more help was required and received confirmation but did not explicitly confirm that the conversation was complete with a closing statement. The agent did mention that the request was taken and that an update would be sent, but the conversational closure could have been more explicit.

category_score_evaluation.legend: When the customer becomes unresponsive or silent during the call, the agent must make three distinct verbal attempts to re-engage before disconnecting. Each attempt must: (1) directly address the customer with 'Hello', 'Sir/Ma'am', or their name, (2) include a verification question like 'Are you still there?' or 'Can you hear me?', and (3) be spaced 10-15 seconds apart to allow adequate response time. If the customer responds at any point, the agent must resume normal conversation. After the third unanswered attempt, the agent may disconnect with a brief closing statement like 'I'll end the call now. Please call us back when ready.' Exception: The agent may disconnect call if there are clear technical indicators of line disconnection.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Not Applicable

auto_qa_result.category: Did the Agent acknowledge customer concern on call and was apologetic/empathetic?

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should promptly acknowledge the customer's concern, demonstrating attentiveness and understanding.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent acknowledged the payment concern ('Okay sir, I will check'), confirmed the EMI payment receipt, and responded to the concern about bounce charges ('I will help you with the process, sir').

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must use appropriate empathy statements whenever Necessary to connect with the customer's emotional state.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent said 'I'm sorry sir' when the customer explained his banking troubles and apologized for the wait after the hold with 'Thank you sir for being online. Apologies for making you.'

auto_qa_result.category: Did the Agent avoid interruption and let the customer speak first? Was the agent actively listening to the customer?

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must avoid conversation overlap by waiting for the customer to finish speaking before responding.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: There is no evidence in the transcript that the agent interrupted the customer; responses only came after the customer spoke.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must demonstrate active listening by acknowledging or paraphrasing the customer's statements appropriately.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent listened to all the details provided and paraphrased account details and actions, such as sharing loan details and confirming receipt of payment.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should refrain from interrupting the customer throughout the conversation to understand the customer's concern clearly.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent never interrupted the customer; pauses were maintained until the customer finished each statement.

auto_qa_result.category: Did the agent behave professionally on the call? (Avoiding Sarcasm, Profanity, Rude tone) and avoid representing the company in a negative way ?

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent maintains a professional and neutral tone throughout the entire call, avoiding any inappropriate language including sarcasm, condescension, mockery, profanity, slang, or dismissive remarks. The agent's word choice and delivery should remain respectful even when addressing difficult situations or customer frustrations.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent maintained a professional tone throughout the conversation and avoided inappropriate language. For instance, she used respectful phrases like 'Okay, sir' and 'Thank you for the verification.'

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent consistently uses polite and courteous language, including appropriate greetings, expressions of empathy (e.g., 'I understand your concern'), gratitude acknowledgments (e.g., 'Thank you for your patience'), and professional closings. The agent actively listens without interrupting and responds with patience and respect throughout the conversation.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent demonstrated politeness and empathy by reassuring the customer and thanking him for his patience, as seen in her interactions when she stated, 'Thank you sir for being online.'

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent avoids making any negative, disparaging, or critical comments about Incred, its policies, processes, products, services, or team members. The agent refrains from statements that could undermine customer confidence, such as blaming the company, expressing frustration with internal systems, or agreeing with customer complaints about Incred in a way that validates criticism.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent did not make any disparaging comments about Incred and refrained from expressing frustration with internal processes. Instead, she explained the payment process politely and constructively.

auto_qa_result.category: Was the agent fluent, Clearly Audible, energetic, enthusiastic & Confident throughout the call?

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should maintain fluency in their speech throughout the call, ensuring smooth and professional communication. The agent should maintain the neutral pace of the conversation and not rush while talking to the customer.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent maintained a mostly fluent and neutral pace during the call with clear explanations when needed.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should be clearly audible, ensuring the customer can hear and understand all parts of the conversation without asking for repetition.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: No signs that the customer missed any information or asked for anything to be repeated.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should demonstrate consistent energy, confidence, and enthusiasm throughout the call, fostering a positive customer experience.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent maintained a polite and professional tone, displaying confidence in their responses, e.g., 'Yes, I'm raising the request to wave off.'

auto_qa_result.category: Did the agent switch language as per customer's comfort and maintain the rate of speech ?

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must effectively switch to the customer's preferred language to ensure clear communication and comfort.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The conversation was comfortably conducted in English and the customer did not express language discomfort.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should maintain a consistent rate of speech, ensuring that the customer can easily follow the conversation.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Agent's responses were clear and the customer followed instructions and information without issue.

category_score_evaluation.legend: If the agent and customer cannot communicate due to a language barrier on the call, the agent must offer the customer a callback request.

auto_qa_result.category: Did the agent form accurate sentences with correct pronunciation and Avoid Slangs/Jargons?

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent's pronunciation should be clear and accurate, making it easy for the customer to understand.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent's sentences are mostly clear, e.g., 'Okay sir, I will check.', 'Thank you for the verification', and 'We have received the EMI payment of October month.' While there are minor grammatical errors and some awkward sentences, the meaning is overall understandable and does not hinder communication.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should avoid using slang, colloquial terms, or jargon like SOA, RS, FC, LPP, CBC, EOD, WCL, LOD, and maintain professionalism and clarity throughout the conversation.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent does not use slang or unexplained jargon. Terms like 'EMI', 'auto debit', and 'bounce charges' are appropriate as the customer clearly mentions and understands them. The agent maintains a professional tone throughout.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should avoid using back-channel cues like 'han', 'hu', 'uh-huh', 'hmm', 'ha', etc., with the customer, as these cues might seem unprofessional to the customer.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent consistently uses professional acknowledgments like 'Okay' instead of informal back-channel cues. There are no instances of 'han', 'hu', or similar.

auto_qa_result.category: Did the agent ask for further assistance?

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent should ask if the customer requires additional help or has any other questions, demonstrating a willingness to support.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: At the end of the conversation, the agent asked, 'Any more help required apart from this?,' which demonstrates the willingness to provide additional assistance.

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must ensure clarity by offering to escalate, transfer, or follow up if required.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent clearly mentioned taking the request to wave off the bounce charges and informed the customer it would be on an approval basis, and that an update would be received via email. This constitutes offering to follow up.

auto_qa_result_summary: The quality audit of the customer support ticket resolution revealed that the agent demonstrated promptness in opening the call but failed to introduce themselves and the brand, which is a significant area for improvement. The agent effectively conducted the right party verification and acknowledged the customer's concerns with empathy. However, the call closure lacked a proper thank you and brand mention, indicating a need for adherence to the closing script. Overall, the agent maintained professionalism and fluency throughout the conversation.

auto_qa_result.category: Agent Call Disconnection

category_score_evaluation.legend: The agent must confirm the conversation is complete before disconnecting by: (1) explicitly asking if the customer has any other questions or concerns (e.g., 'Is there anything else I can help you with today?'), (2) waiting for customer confirmation that their issue is resolved or they have no further queries, and (3) providing a professional closing statement before disconnecting. Exception: The agent may disconnect immediately without these steps if the customer uses abusive, threatening, or profane language after one warning
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: The agent confirmed the customer had no further concerns before closing the conversation. The agent asked, 'Any more help required apart from this?' which allowed the customer to respond before closing.

category_score_evaluation.legend: When the customer becomes unresponsive or silent during the call, the agent must make three distinct verbal attempts to re-engage before disconnecting. Each attempt must: (1) directly address the customer with 'Hello', 'Sir/Ma'am', or their name, (2) include a verification question like 'Are you still there?' or 'Can you hear me?', and (3) be spaced 10-15 seconds apart to allow adequate response time. If the customer responds at any point, the agent must resume normal conversation. After the third unanswered attempt, the agent may disconnect with a brief closing statement like 'I'll end the call now. Please call us back when ready.' Exception: The agent may disconnect call if there are clear technical indicators of line disconnection.
category_score_evaluation.evaluation_reason: Not Applicable
